conditions.keyValue: ={{ (() => { const d = new Date(); d.setDate(d.getDate() - 7); return `${d.getFullYear()}-${String(d.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0')}-${String(d.getDate()).padStart(2,'0')}T00:00:00`; })() }}
